00159 // Tools for equidistant test function sampling in objective space 
00160 //************************************************************************

00163 unsigned approxEquidistantFrontDoIt(Array<double> &v, Array<double> &w, unsigned n, double d) {
00164   double dCurrent, dPrevious; 
00165   unsigned i, k;
00166 
00167   k = 1;
00168   for(i = 1; i < v.dim(0) - 1; i++) {
00169     dCurrent =  sqrt(sqr(w(k - 1, 0) - v(i    , 0)) + sqr(w(k - 1, 1) - v(i    , 1)));
00170     dPrevious = sqrt(sqr(w(k - 1, 0) - v(i - 1, 0)) + sqr(w(k - 1, 1) - v(i - 1, 1)));
00171     if(dCurrent > d) { 
00172       if(dPrevious == 0) { // if the adjacent point is far, take it
00173         w[k] = v[i];
00174         k++;
00175       } else { // take current
00176         if(fabs(dCurrent - d) < fabs(dPrevious - d)) {
00177           if(k >= n) { 
00178             return k + 1;
00179           }
00180           w[k] = v[i];
00181           k++;
00182         } else { // take previous
00183           if(k >= n) { 
00184             return k + 1;
00185           }
00186           w[k] = v[i - 1];
00187           k++;
00188           i--;
00189         }
00190       }
00191     } 
00192   }
00193   return k;
00194 }
00195 
00196 void approxEquidistantFront(Array<double> &v, Array<double> &w, unsigned n = 500, double eps = 0.000001) {
00197   double sum = 0;
00198   unsigned i, k;
00199   if(v.ndim() != 2) {
00200     std::cerr << "makeUpsilonFront: input Array has wrong dimension" << std::endl;
00201     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00202   }
00203 
00204   if(v.dim(0) < n) {
00205     std::cerr << "makeUpsilonFront: input Array has not enough sample points" << std::endl;
00206     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00207   } 
00208 
00209   w.resize(n, 2, false);
00210 
00211   // sort w.r.t. first component
00212   sort2DBy1st(v);
00213 
00214   // compute length of front
00215   for(i =0; i < v.dim(0) - 1; i++) 
00216     if(v(i + 1, 0) - v(i, 0)) sum += (v(i + 1, 0) - v(i, 0)) * 
00217       sqrt(1 + sqr((v(i + 1, 1) - v(i, 1))  / (v(i + 1, 0) - v(i, 0))));
00218 
00219   // fix end
00220   w[0] = v[0];
00221 
00222   double dOld, d;
00223   dOld = d = sum / (n - 1.);
00224 
00225   k = approxEquidistantFrontDoIt(v, w,  n, d);
00226   while (k != n) {
00227     dOld = d;
00228     if(k < n) d *= (1. - eps);     
00229     if(k > n) d *= (1. + eps);     
00230     k = approxEquidistantFrontDoIt(v, w,  n, d);
00231     //cerr << k << " " << d << endl;
00232   } 
00233 
00234  std::cout << "d = " << d << std::endl;
00235  std::cerr << "d = " << d << std::endl;
00236 
00237   w[n - 1] = v[v.dim(0) - 1];
00238 
00239 }

00254 //************************************************************************
00255 // Sphere Test Function (Deb's SCH)
00256 //************************************************************************
00257 double SphereF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
00258 {
00259         double    sum = 0.0;
00260         unsigned  n;
00261 
00262         n = x.size( );
00263         for ( unsigned i = n; i--; )
00264         {
00265                 sum += x[ i ] * x[ i ];
00266         }
00267 
00268         return sum / (double)n;
00269 }
00270 //
00271 double SphereF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
00272 {
00273         double   sum = 0.0;
00274         unsigned n;
00275 
00276         n = x.size( );
00277         for ( unsigned i = n; i--; )
00278         {
00279                 sum += ( x[ i ] - 2.0 ) * ( x[ i ] - 2.0 );
00280         }
00281 
00282         return sum / (double)n;
00283 }
00284 
00285 //************************************************************************
00286 // Deb's Convex Test Function (ZDT 1)
00287 //************************************************************************
00288 double DebConvexF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
00289 {
00290         unsigned n;
00291         n = x.size( );
00292         // Penalty
00293         for ( unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00294         {
00295                 if ( x[ i ] > 1.0 || x[ i ] < 0.0 )
00296                 {
00297                         return 5.0;
00298                 }
00299         }
00300         return x[ 0 ];
00301 }
00302 //
00303 double DebConvexF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
00304 {
00305         unsigned i;
00306         double   sum = 0.0;
00307         unsigned n;
00308         double   g, f1, f2;
00309         f1 = x[ 0 ];
00310         n  = x.size( );
00311         // Penalty
00312         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00313         {
00314                 if ( x[ i ] > 1.0 || x[ i ] < 0.0 )
00315                 {
00316                         return 10.0;
00317                 }
00318         }
00319         //
00320         for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
00321         {
00322                 sum += x[ i ];
00323         }
00324         g = 1.0 + 9.0 * sum / (double)( n - 1 );
00325         f2 = g * ( 1.0 - sqrt( f1 / g ) );
00326         return f2;
00327 }
00328 
00329 //************************************************************************
00330 // Deb's Concave Test Function (ZDT 2)
00331 //************************************************************************
00332 double DebConcaveF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
00333 {
00334         unsigned n;
00335         unsigned i;
00336         n = x.size( );
00337         // Penalty
00338         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00339         {
00340                 if ( x[ i ] > 1.0 || x[ i ] < 0.0 )
00341                 {
00342                         return 5.0;
00343                 }
00344         }
00345 
00346         return x[ 0 ];
00347 }
00348 //
00349 double DebConcaveF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
00350 {
00351         double   sum = 0.0;
00352         unsigned n;
00353         double   g, f1, f2;
00354         unsigned i;
00355         f1 = x[ 0 ];
00356         n  = x.size( );
00357         // Penalty
00358         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00359         {
00360                 if ( x[ i ] > 1.0 || x[ i ] < 0.0 )
00361                 {
00362                         return 10.0;
00363                 }
00364         }
00365         //
00366         for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
00367         {
00368                 sum += x[ i ];
00369         }
00370         g = 1.0 + 9.0 * sum / (double)( n - 1 );
00371         f2 = g * ( 1.0 - ( f1 / g ) * ( f1 / g ) );
00372         return f2;
00373 }
00374 
00375 //************************************************************************
00376 // Deb's Discrete Test Function (ZDT 3)
00377 //************************************************************************
00378 double DebDiscreteF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
00379 {
00380         unsigned n;
00381         unsigned i;
00382         n = x.size( );
00383         // Penalty
00384         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00385         {
00386                 if ( x[ i ] > 1.0 || x[ i ] < 0.0 )
00387                 {
00388                         return 5.0;
00389                 }
00390         }
00391 
00392         return x[ 0 ];
00393 }
00394 //
00395 double DebDiscreteF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
00396 {
00397         double   sum = 0.0;
00398         unsigned n;
00399         double   g, f1, f2;
00400         unsigned i;
00401         f1 = x[ 0 ];
00402         n  = x.size( );
00403         // Penalty
00404         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00405         {
00406                 if ( x[ i ] > 1.0 || x[ i ] < 0.0 )
00407                 {
00408                         return 10.0;
00409                 }
00410         }
00411         //
00412         for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
00413         {
00414                 sum += x[ i ];
00415         }
00416         g = 1.0 + 9.0 * sum / (double)( n - 1 );
00417         f2 = g * ( 1.0 - sqrt( f1 / g ) - ( f1 / g ) * sin( 10 * znPiC * f1 ) );
00418         return f2;
00419 }
00420 
00421 //************************************************************************
00422 // Fonseca's Concave Test Function (Deb's FON)
00423 //************************************************************************
00424 double FonsecaConcaveF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
00425 {
00426         double   sum = 0.0;
00427         unsigned n;
00428         unsigned i;
00429         n = x.size( );
00430         for ( i = n; i--; )
00431         {
00432                 sum += ( x[ i ] - 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n )) * ( x[ i ] - 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n ));
00433         }
00434 
00435 
00436 
00437         return 1.0 - exp( -sum );
00438 }
00439 //
00440 double FonsecaConcaveF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
00441 {
00442         double   sum = 0.0;
00443         unsigned n;
00444         unsigned i;
00445         n = x.size( );
00446         for ( i = n; i--; )
00447         {
00448                 sum += ( x[ i ] + 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n )) * ( x[ i ] + 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n ));
00449         }
00450 
00451         return 1.0 - exp( -sum );
00452 }
00453 
00454 void FonsecaConcaveSampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, unsigned n  = 500) 
00455 {
00456         double xmin = -1./sqrt((double)dimension);
00457         double xmax = 1./sqrt((double)dimension);
00458         unsigned i  = 0, ii = 0;
00459         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
00460 
00461         pf.resize(n, 2u);
00462         unsigned raw = 10 * n;
00463         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
00464 
00465         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
00466 
00467         for(double x = xmin;  x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it,i++) 
00468         { 
00469                 for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++)
00470                   xv[ii] = x;
00471                 
00472                 raw_pf(i, 0) = FonsecaConcaveF1( xv );
00473                 raw_pf(i, 1) = FonsecaConcaveF2( xv );
00474         }
00475         i = raw - 1;
00476         for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++)
00477         {
00478           xv[ii] = xmax;
00479         }
00480         raw_pf(i, 0) = FonsecaConcaveF1( xv );
00481         raw_pf(i, 1) = FonsecaConcaveF2( xv );
00482 
00483         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
00484 }
00485 
00486 void FonsecaConcaveSample(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, unsigned n  = 500) 
00487 {
00488         if(dimension!=2)
00489         {
00490                 std::cerr << "sorry, method implemented for two dimensions only ..." << std::endl;
00491                 return;
00492         }
00493         double xmin = -1./sqrt((double)dimension);
00494         double xmax = 1./sqrt((double)dimension);
00495         unsigned i  = 0;
00496         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
00497 
00498         pf.resize(n*n, 2u);
00499 
00500         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (n - 1.);
00501 
00502         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it) 
00503         {
00504                 xv[0] = x;
00505                 for(double y = xmin; y < xmax - 0.1 * it; y += it) 
00506                 {
00507                         xv[1] = y; 
00508                         pf(i, 0) = FonsecaConcaveF1( xv );
00509                         pf(i, 1) = FonsecaConcaveF2( xv );
00510                         i++;
00511                 }
00512                 xv[1] = xmax; 
00513                 pf(i, 0) = FonsecaConcaveF1( xv );
00514                 pf(i, 1) = FonsecaConcaveF2( xv );
00515                 i++;
00516         }
00517         xv[0] = xmax;
00518         for(double y = xmin; y < xmax - 0.1 * it; y += it) 
00519         {
00520                 xv[1] = y; 
00521                 pf(i, 0) = FonsecaConcaveF1( xv );
00522                 pf(i, 1) = FonsecaConcaveF2( xv );
00523                 i++;
00524         }
00525         xv[1] = xmax; 
00526         pf(i, 0) = FonsecaConcaveF1( xv );
00527         pf(i, 1) = FonsecaConcaveF2( xv );
00528 }
00529 
00530 //************************************************************************
00531 // Messac's Concave Test Function
00532 //************************************************************************
00533 double MessacConcaveF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
00534 {
00535         double   sum = 0.0;
00536         unsigned n,i;
00537 
00538         n = x.size( );
00539         for ( i = n; i--; )
00540         {
00541                 sum += exp( -x[ i ] ) + 1.4 * exp( -x[ i ] * x[ i ] );
00542         }
00543 
00544         return sum;
00545 }
00546 //
00547 double MessacConcaveF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
00548 {
00549         double   sum = 0.0;
00550         unsigned n,i;
00551 
00552         n = x.size( );
00553         for ( i = n; i--; )
00554         {
00555                 sum += exp( +x[ i ] ) + 1.4 * exp( -x[ i ] * x[ i ] );
00556         }
00557 
00558         return sum;
00559 }
00560 
00561 void MessacConcaveSampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, double lower, double upper, unsigned n  = 500) 
00562 {
00563         if(dimension!=1)
00564         {
00565                 std::cerr << "sorry, method implemented for one dimension only ..." << std::endl;
00566                 return;
00567         }
00568 
00569         double xmin = lower;
00570         double xmax = upper;
00571         unsigned i = 0, ii=0;
00572         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
00573 
00574         pf.resize(n, 2u);
00575 
00576         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (n - 1.);
00577 
00578         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
00579         { 
00580                 for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++) xv[ii] = x;
00581                 pf(i, 0) = MessacConcaveF1( xv );
00582                 pf(i, 1) = MessacConcaveF2( xv );
00583         }
00584         i = n - 1;
00585         for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++) xv[ii] = xmax;
00586         pf(i, 0) = MessacConcaveF1( xv );
00587         pf(i, 1) = MessacConcaveF2( xv );
00588 }
00589 
00590 void MessacConcaveSample(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, double lower, double upper) 
00591 {
00592         if(dimension!=2)
00593         {
00594                 std::cerr << "sorry, method implemented for two dimensions only ..." << std::endl;
00595                 return;
00596         }
00597 
00598         double xmin = lower;
00599         double xmax = upper;
00600         unsigned n  = 100, i = 0;
00601         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
00602 
00603         pf.resize(n*n, 2u);
00604 
00605         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (n - 1.);
00606 
00607         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it) 
00608         {
00609                 xv[0] = x;
00610                 for(double y = xmin; y < xmax - 0.1 * it; y += it) 
00611                 {
00612                         xv[1] =  y;
00613                         pf(i, 0) = MessacConcaveF1( xv );
00614                         pf(i, 1) = MessacConcaveF2( xv );
00615                         i++;
00616                 }
00617                 xv[1] =  xmax;
00618                 pf(i, 0) = MessacConcaveF1( xv );
00619                 pf(i, 1) = MessacConcaveF2( xv );
00620                 i++;
00621         }
00622         xv[0] = xmax;
00623         for(double y = xmin; y < xmax - 0.1 * it; y += it) 
00624         {
00625                 xv[1] =  y;
00626                 pf(i, 0) = MessacConcaveF1( xv );
00627                 pf(i, 1) = MessacConcaveF2( xv );
00628                 i++;
00629         }
00630         xv[1] =  xmax;
00631         pf(i, 0) = MessacConcaveF1( xv );
00632         pf(i, 1) = MessacConcaveF2( xv );
00633 }

00647 //************************************************************************
00648 // Helpers
00649 //************************************************************************
00650 
00651 double norm(const Array<double> &a) 
00652 {
00653         double sum = 0;
00654         unsigned i ;
00655         for(i = 0; i < a.nelem(); i++) sum += a(i)*a(i);
00656         return sqrt(sum);
00657 }
00658 
00659 double scalarprod(const Array<double> &a, const Array<double> &b) 
00660 {
00661         double sum = 0;
00662         unsigned i;
00663         for(i = 0; i < a.nelem(); i++)
00664                 sum += a(i) * b(i);
00665         return sum;
00666 }
00667 
00668 double scalarprod(const Array<double> &a, const std::vector<double> &b) 
00669 {
00670         double sum = 0;
00671         unsigned i;
00672 
00673         if(a.ndim()!=1 || a.nelem()!=b.size())
00674         {
00675                 std::cerr << "check size of vector or Array" << std::endl;
00676                 exit(0);
00677         }
00678 
00679         for(i = 0; i < a.nelem(); i++)
00680                 sum += a(i) * b[i];
00681         return sum;
00682 }
00683 
00684 
00685 void generateBasis(unsigned d, Array<double> &B) 
00686 {
00687   unsigned i, j, c;
00688   double normB;
00689   Array<double> H;
00690   B.resize(d, d);
00691   H.resize(d, d);
00692   for(i = 0; i < d; i++) 
00693     for(c = 0; c < d; c++)
00694       B(i, c) = Rng::gauss(0, 1);
00695 
00696   for(i = 0; i < d; i++) {
00697     for(j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00698       H=B;
00699       for(c = 0; c < d; c++) 
00700         B(i, c) -= scalarprod(H[i], H[j]) * H(j, c);
00701     }
00702     normB = norm(B[i]);
00703     for(j = 0; j < d; j++) B(i, j) = B(i, j) / normB;
00704   }
00705 }
00706 
00707 //************************************************************************
00708 // Rotated paraboloid 
00709 //************************************************************************
00710 
00711 double RotParF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond)
00712 {
00713         unsigned i; 
00714         double sum = 0.;
00715 
00716         Array<double> v(_v.size());
00717 
00718         for(i = 0; i < v.dim(0); i++)
00719         {
00720                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
00721                 sum += sqr(pow(cond, (double(i) / double(v.dim(0) - 1))) * v(i)) ;
00722         }
00723 
00724         return sum / (cond * cond * v.dim(0));
00725 }
00726 
00727 double RotParF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond1, double cond2=2)
00728 {
00729         unsigned i; 
00730         double sum = 0.;
00731 
00732         Array<double> v(_v.size());
00733 
00734         for(i = 0; i < v.dim(0); i++)
00735         {
00736                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
00737                 sum += sqr(pow(cond1, (double(i) / double(v.dim(0) - 1))) * (v(i) - cond2)) ;
00738         }
00739 
00740         return sum / (cond1 * cond1 * v.dim(0));
00741 }
00742 
00743 double RotParF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond)
00744 {
00745   unsigned i; 
00746 
00747   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
00748     {
00749       // Penalty
00750       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
00751         {
00752 #ifdef _WIN32
00753           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00754 #else
00755           return MAXDOUBLE;
00756 #endif
00757         }
00758       //
00759     }
00760 
00761   return RotParF1(_v, coord, cond);
00762 }
00763 
00764 double RotParF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond1, double cond2=2)
00765 {
00766   unsigned i; 
00767   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
00768     {
00769       // Penalty
00770       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
00771         {
00772 #ifdef _WIN32
00773           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00774 #else
00775           return MAXDOUBLE;
00776 #endif
00777         }
00778       //
00779     }
00780 
00781   return RotParF2(_v, coord, cond1,cond2);
00782 }
00783 
00784 void RotParSampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, double cond , double cond2 = 2, unsigned n  = 100000) 
00785 {
00786         double xmin = 0;
00787         double xmax = cond2;
00788         unsigned  i = 0,ii=0;
00789         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
00790 
00791         pf.resize(n, 2u);
00792         unsigned raw = 40 * n;
00793         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
00794 
00795         Array<double> B(dimension,dimension);
00796         B = 0; for(i=0;i<B.dim(0);i++) B(i,i)=1;
00797 
00798         i=0;
00799         double it = (xmax - xmin) / ( raw - 1.);
00800 
00801         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
00802         { 
00803                 for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++) xv[ii] = x;
00804                 raw_pf(i, 0) = RotParF1( xv, B, cond );
00805                 raw_pf(i, 1) = RotParF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00806         }
00807         i = raw - 1;
00808         for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++) xv[ii] = xmax;
00809         raw_pf(i, 0) = RotParF1( xv, B, cond );
00810         raw_pf(i, 1) = RotParF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00811 
00812         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
00813 }
00814 
00815 void RotParSample(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, double cond , double cond2=2 ) 
00816 {
00817         if(dimension!=2)
00818         {
00819                 std::cerr << "sorry, method implemented for one dimension only ..." << std::endl;
00820                 return;
00821         }
00822 
00823         double xmin = 0, x, y;
00824         double xmax = cond2;
00825         unsigned n  = 100, i = 0;
00826         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
00827 
00828         pf.resize(n*n, 2u);
00829 
00830         Array<double> B(dimension,dimension);
00831         B = 0; for(i=0;i<B.dim(0);i++) B(i,i)=1;
00832 
00833         i = 0;
00834 
00835         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (n - 1.);
00836 
00837         for(x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it) 
00838         {
00839                 xv[0] = x;
00840                 for(y = xmin; y < xmax - 0.1 * it; y += it) 
00841                 {
00842                         xv[1] = y;
00843                         pf(i, 0) = RotParF1( xv, B, cond );
00844                         pf(i, 1) = RotParF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00845                         i++;
00846                 }
00847                 xv[1] = xmax;
00848                 pf(i, 0) = RotParF1( xv, B, cond );
00849                 pf(i, 1) = RotParF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00850                 i++;
00851         }
00852         xv[0] = xmax;
00853         for(y = xmin; y < xmax - 0.1 * it; y += it) 
00854         {
00855                 xv[1] = y;
00856                 pf(i, 0) = RotParF1( xv, B, cond );
00857                 pf(i, 1) = RotParF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00858                 i++;
00859         }
00860         xv[1] = y;
00861         pf(i, 0) = RotParF1( xv, B, cond );
00862         pf(i, 1) = RotParF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00863 }
00864 
00865 
00866 //************************************************************************
00867 // Rotated cigar
00868 //************************************************************************
00869 
00870 double RotCigarF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond)
00871 {
00872         unsigned i; 
00873         double sum = 0.;
00874 
00875         Array<double> v(_v.size());
00876 
00877         v(0) = scalarprod(coord.col(0),_v);
00878         sum += v(0) * v(0) ;
00879 
00880         for(i = 1; i < v.dim(0); i++)
00881         {
00882                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
00883                 sum += sqr( cond * v(i) ) ;
00884         }
00885 
00886         return sum / (cond * cond * v.dim(0));
00887 }
00888 
00889 double RotCigarF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond1, double cond2=2)
00890 {
00891         unsigned i; 
00892         double sum = 0.;
00893 
00894         Array<double> v(_v.size());
00895 
00896         v(0) = scalarprod(coord.col(0),_v);
00897         sum += (v(0) - cond2) * (v(0) - cond2) ;
00898 
00899         for(i = 1; i < v.dim(0); i++)
00900         {
00901                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
00902                 sum += sqr( cond1 * (v(i) - cond2) ) ;
00903         }
00904 
00905         return sum / (cond1 * cond1 * v.dim(0));
00906 }
00907 
00908 double RotCigarF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond)
00909 {
00910   unsigned i; 
00911 
00912   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
00913     {
00914       // Penalty
00915       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
00916         {
00917 #ifdef _WIN32
00918           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00919 #else
00920           return MAXDOUBLE;
00921 #endif
00922         }
00923       //
00924     }
00925 
00926   return RotCigarF1(_v, coord, cond);
00927 }
00928 
00929 double RotCigarF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond1, double cond2=2)
00930 {
00931   unsigned i; 
00932   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
00933     {
00934       // Penalty
00935       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
00936         {
00937 #ifdef _WIN32
00938           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00939 #else
00940           return MAXDOUBLE;
00941 #endif
00942         }

00949 void RotCigarSampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, double cond , double cond2=2, unsigned n  = 100000) 
00950 {
00951         double xmin = 0;
00952         double xmax = cond2;
00953         unsigned i = 0, ii=0;
00954         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
00955 
00956         pf.resize(n, 2u);
00957         unsigned raw = 10 * n;
00958         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
00959 
00960         Array<double> B(dimension,dimension);
00961         B = 0; for(i=0;i<B.dim(0);i++) B(i,i)=1;
00962 
00963         i = 0;
00964 
00965         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
00966 
00967         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
00968         { 
00969                 for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++) xv[ii] = x;
00970                 raw_pf(i, 0) = RotCigarF1( xv, B, cond );
00971                 raw_pf(i, 1) = RotCigarF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00972         }
00973         i = raw - 1;
00974         for(ii = 0; ii < xv.size(); ii++) xv[ii] = xmax;
00975         raw_pf(i, 0) = RotCigarF1( xv, B, cond );
00976         raw_pf(i, 1) = RotCigarF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
00977 
00978         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
00979 }

00981 //************************************************************************
00982 // Rotated cigtab
00983 //************************************************************************
00984 
00985 double RotCigTabF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond)
00986 {
00987         unsigned i, n; 
00988         double sum = 0.;
00989 
00990         n = _v.size();
00991         Array<double> v;
00992         v.resize(n, false);
00993 
00994         v(0) = scalarprod(coord.col(0),_v);
00995         sum += v(0) * v(0) ;
00996         v(n - 1) = scalarprod(coord.col(n - 1),_v);
00997         sum += sqr(cond * v(n - 1)) ;
00998 
00999         for(i = 1; i < n - 1; i++)
01000         {
01001                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
01002                 sum += cond * sqr( v(i) ) ;
01003         }
01004 
01005         return sum / (cond * cond * n);
01006 }
01007 
01008 double RotCigTabF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond1, double cond2=2)
01009 {
01010         unsigned i, n; 
01011         double sum = 0.;
01012 
01013         n = _v.size();
01014         Array<double> v;
01015         v.resize(n, false);
01016 
01017         v(0) = scalarprod(coord.col(0),_v);
01018         sum += sqr(v(0) - cond2);
01019         v(n - 1) = scalarprod(coord.col(n - 1),_v);
01020         sum += sqr(cond1 * (v(n - 1) - cond2));
01021 
01022         for(i = 1; i < n - 1; i++)
01023         {
01024                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
01025                 sum += cond1 * sqr(v(i) - cond2) ;
01026         }
01027 
01028         return sum / (cond1 * cond1 * n);
01029 }
01030 
01031 double RotCigTabF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond)
01032 {
01033   unsigned i; 
01034 
01035   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
01036     {
01037       // Penalty
01038       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
01039         {
01040 #ifdef _WIN32
01041           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
01042 #else
01043           return MAXDOUBLE;
01044 #endif
01045         }
01046       //
01047     }
01048 
01049   return RotCigTabF1(_v, coord, cond);
01050 }
01051 
01052 double RotCigTabF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond1, double cond2=2)
01053 {
01054   unsigned i; 
01055   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
01056     {
01057       // Penalty
01058       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
01059         {
01060 #ifdef _WIN32
01061           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
01062 #else
01063           return MAXDOUBLE;
01064 #endif
01065         }

01104 //************************************************************************
01105 // Rotated tablet
01106 //************************************************************************
01107 
01108 double RotTabletF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond)
01109 {
01110         unsigned i; 
01111         double sum = 0.;
01112 
01113         Array<double> v(_v.size());
01114 
01115         v(0) = scalarprod(coord.col(0),_v);
01116         sum += sqr(cond * v(0));
01117 
01118         for(i = 1; i < v.dim(0); i++)
01119         {
01120                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
01121                 sum += v(i) * v(i);
01122         }
01123 
01124         return sum / (cond * cond * v.dim(0));
01125 }
01126 
01127 double RotTabletF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, double cond1, double cond2=2)
01128 {
01129         unsigned i; 
01130         double sum = 0.;
01131 
01132         Array<double> v(_v.size());
01133 
01134         v(0) = scalarprod(coord.col(0),_v);
01135         sum += sqr(cond1 * (v(0) - cond2)) ;
01136 
01137         for(i = 1; i < v.dim(0); i++)
01138         {
01139                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),_v);
01140                 sum += (v(i) - cond2) * (v(i) - cond2) ;
01141         }
01142 
01143         return sum / (cond1 * cond1 * v.dim(0));
01144 }
01145 
01146 double RotTabletF1(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond)
01147 {
01148   unsigned i; 
01149 
01150   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
01151     {
01152       // Penalty
01153       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
01154         {
01155 #ifdef _WIN32
01156           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
01157 #else
01158           return MAXDOUBLE;
01159 #endif
01160         }
01161       //
01162     }
01163 
01164   return RotTabletF1(_v, coord, cond);
01165 }
01166 
01167 double RotTabletF2(const std::vector<double> &_v, Array<double> &coord, const std::vector<double> &lower, const std::vector<double> &upper, double cond1, double cond2=2)
01168 {
01169   unsigned i; 
01170   for (i = 0; i < _v.size();i++)
01171     {
01172       // Penalty
01173       if ( _v[i] > upper[i] || _v[i] < lower[i] )
01174         {
01175 #ifdef _WIN32
01176           return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
01177 #else
01178           return MAXDOUBLE;
01179 #endif
01180         }
01181       //
01182     }
01183 
01184   return RotTabletF2(_v, coord, cond1,cond2);
01185 }
01186 
01187 void RotTabletSampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, double cond , double cond2 = 2, unsigned  n  = 100000) 
01188 {
01189         double xmin = 0;
01190         double xmax = cond2;
01191         unsigned i = 0,ii=0;
01192         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
01193 
01194         pf.resize(n, 2u);
01195         unsigned raw = 20 * n;
01196         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
01197 
01198         Array<double> B(dimension,dimension);
01199         B = 0; for(i=0;i<B.dim(0);i++) B(i,i)=1;
01200 
01201         i = 0;
01202         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
01203 
01204         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
01205         { 
01206                 for(ii = 0; ii < dimension; ii++) xv[ii] = x;
01207                 raw_pf(i, 0) = RotTabletF1( xv, B, cond );
01208                 raw_pf(i, 1) = RotTabletF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
01209         }
01210         i = raw - 1;
01211         for(ii = 0; ii < dimension; ii++) xv[ii] = xmax;
01212         raw_pf (i, 0) = RotTabletF1( xv, B, cond );
01213         raw_pf (i, 1) = RotTabletF2( xv, B, cond, cond2 );
01214 
01215         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
01216 }
01217 
01218 //************************************************************************
01219 // Fonseca's Concave Test Function (Deb's FON)
01220 //************************************************************************
01221 double RotFonsecaConcaveF1( const std::vector< double >& x, Array<double> &coord, double cond)
01222 {
01223         unsigned n = x.size();
01224         unsigned i;
01225         Array<double> y(n);
01226         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) y(i) = pow(cond, double(i) / double(n - 1)) * scalarprod(coord.col(i), x);
01227         double   sum = 0.0;
01228 
01229         for ( i = n; i--; )
01230           sum += ( y(i) - 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n )) * ( y(i) - 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n ));
01231 
01232         return 1.0 - exp( -sum );
01233 }
01234 //
01235 double RotFonsecaConcaveF2( const std::vector< double >& x, Array<double> &coord, double cond)
01236 {
01237         unsigned n = x.size();
01238         unsigned i;
01239         Array<double> y(n);
01240         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) y(i) = pow(cond, double(i) / double(n - 1)) * scalarprod(coord.col(i), x);
01241         double   sum = 0.0;
01242 
01243         for ( i = n; i--; ) sum += ( y(i) + 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n )) * ( y(i) + 1.0 / sqrt( (double)n ));
01244 
01245         return 1.0 - exp( -sum );
01246 }
01247 
01248 
01249 //************************************************************************
01250 // Deb's Rotated problem (IEEE Transactions on EA 6(2), 2002)
01251 //************************************************************************
01252 
01253 double DebRotatedF1( const std::vector< double > &x, Array<double> &coord )
01254 {
01255         double f1;//, penalty = 0;
01256         f1 = scalarprod(coord.col(0),x);
01257 
01258         // Penalty
01259         if ( f1 > .3 || f1 < -.3 )
01260         {
01261                 //penalty = fabs(f1) - .3;
01262 #ifdef _WIN32
01263                 return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
01264 #else
01265                 return MAXDOUBLE;
01266 #endif
01267         }
01268         //
01269         return f1 ;//+ penalty;
01270 }
01271 
01272 
01273 //
01274 double DebRotatedF2( const std::vector< double >& x, Array<double> &coord )
01275 {
01276         double   sum = 0.0;
01277         unsigned n;
01278         double   g, f1, f2;//, penalty=0;
01279         unsigned i;
01280 
01281         n  = x.size( );
01282 
01283         Array<double> v(n);
01284 
01285         for(i = 0; i < n; i++)
01286                 v(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i),x);
01287 
01288         f1 = v(0);
01289 
01290         if ( f1 > .3 || f1 < -.3 )
01291         {
01292                 //penalty = fabs(f1) - .3;              
01293 #ifdef _WIN32
01294                 return std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
01295 #else
01296                 return MAXDOUBLE;
01297 #endif
01298         }
01299 
01300         //
01301         for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
01302                 sum += v( i ) * v( i ) - 10. * cos(4 * M_PI * v(i));
01303 
01304         g = 1.0 + 10. * (double)( n - 1 ) + sum;
01305 
01306         f2 = g * exp( - 1. * ( f1 / g ) );
01307 
01308         return f2 ;//+ penalty;
01309 }
01310 
01311 
01312 void DebRotatedSampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned dimension, unsigned n  = 500) 
01313 {
01314         double xmin = -.3;
01315         double xmax = .3;
01316         unsigned i = 0;
01317         std::vector< double > xv(dimension);
01318 
01319         pf.resize(n, 2u);
01320         unsigned raw = 10 * n;
01321         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
01322 
01323         Array<double> B(dimension,dimension);
01324         B = 0; for(i=0;i<B.dim(0);i++) B(i,i)=1;
01325 
01326         for(i = 1; i < xv.size(); i++) xv[i] = 0.;
01327 
01328         i = 0;
01329         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
01330 
01331         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
01332         {
01333                 xv[0] = x;
01334                 raw_pf(i, 0) = DebRotatedF1( xv, B );
01335                 raw_pf(i, 1) = DebRotatedF2( xv, B );
01336         }
01337         i = raw - 1;
01338         xv[0] = xmax;
01339         raw_pf(i, 0) = DebRotatedF1( xv, B );
01340         raw_pf(i, 1) = DebRotatedF2( xv, B );
01341 
01342         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
01343 }
01344 
01345 //
01346 //************************************************************************
01347 // End of paraboloid test functions 
01348 //************************************************************************
01349 //
01350 
01351 //
01352 //************************************************************************
01353 // ZDT test function implementation of Christian Igel
01354 //************************************************************************
01355 //
01356 
01357 double CI1F1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01358 {
01359         return x[0] * x[0];
01360 }
01361 
01362 double CI1F2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01363 {
01364         return (x[1] - 2.) * (x[1] - 2.) + (x[2] - 2.) * (x[2] - 2.);
01365 }
01366 
01367 double CI2F1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01368 {
01369         return x[0] * x[0];
01370 }
01371 
01372 double CI2F2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01373 {
01374         return (x[0] - 2.) * (x[0] - 2.) + x[1] * x[1];
01375 }
01376 
01377 //************************************************************************
01378 // ZDT 1
01379 //************************************************************************
01380 
01381 double ZDT1F1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01382 {
01383         return fabs(x[0]);
01384 }
01385 
01386 double ZDT1G(const std::vector< double >& x )
01387 {
01388         double g = 0;
01389         unsigned n = x.size( );
01390         for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; i++ ) 
01391                 g += fabs((x[i]));
01392         g = 9 * g / (n - 1.) + 1.;
01393         return g;
01394 }
01395 
01396 double ZDT1F2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01397 {
01398         return  ZDT1G(x) * (1 - sqrt( fabs(x[0]) /  ZDT1G(x) ));
01399 }
01400 
01401 void ZDT1SampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned n = 500) 
01402 {
01403         double xmin = 0;
01404         double xmax = 1.;
01405 
01406         pf.resize(n, 2u);
01407         unsigned raw = 10 * n;
01408         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
01409 
01410         std::vector< double > xv(30);
01411 
01412         unsigned i = 0;
01413         for(i = 1; i < 30; i++) xv[i] = 0.;
01414         i = 0;
01415 
01416         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
01417 
01418         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
01419         {
01420                 xv[0] = x;
01421                 raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT1F1( xv );
01422                 raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT1F2( xv );
01423         }
01424         i = raw - 1;
01425         xv[0] = xmax;
01426         raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT1F1( xv );
01427         raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT1F2( xv );
01428 
01429         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
01430 }

01439         return x[0];
01440 }
01441 
01442 double ZDT2G(const std::vector< double >& x )
01443 {
01444         double g = 0;
01445         unsigned n = x.size( );
01446         for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; i++ ) 
01447                 g += x[i];
01448         g = 9 * g / (n - 1.) + 1.;
01449         return g;
01450 }
01451 
01452 double ZDT2F2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01453 {
01454         return  ZDT2G(x) * (1 - sqr( x[0] /  ZDT2G(x) ));
01455 }
01456 
01457 void ZDT2SampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned n = 500) 
01458 {
01459         double xmin = 0;
01460         double xmax = 1.;

01462         pf.resize(n, 2u);

01464         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
01465 
01466         std::vector< double > xv(30);
01467 
01468         unsigned i = 0;
01469         for(i = 1; i < 30; i++) xv[i] = 0.;
01470         i = 0;
01471         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
01472 
01473         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
01474         {
01475                 xv[0] = x;
01476                 raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT2F1( xv );
01477                 raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT2F2( xv );
01478         }
01479         i = raw - 1;

01487 //************************************************************************
01488 // ZDT 3
01489 //************************************************************************
01490 
01491 double ZDT3F1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01492 {
01493         return x[0];
01494 }
01495 
01496 double ZDT3G(const std::vector< double >& x )
01497 {
01498         double g = 0;
01499         unsigned n = x.size( );
01500         for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; i++ ) 
01501                 g += x[i];
01502         g = 9 * g / (n - 1.) + 1.;
01503         return g;
01504 }
01505 
01506 double ZDT3F2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01507 {
01508         double gx = ZDT3G(x);
01509         return  gx * (1 - sqrt( x[0] / gx ) - x[0]/gx * sin (10 * M_PI *  x[0]) );
01510 }
01511 
01512 void ZDT3SampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned n = 500) 
01513 {
01514         double xmin = 0;
01515         double xmax = 1.;
01516         std::vector< double > xv(30);
01517 
01518         pf.resize(n, 2u);
01519         unsigned raw = 40 * n;
01520         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
01521 
01522         unsigned i = 0;
01523         for(i = 1; i < 30; i++) xv[i] = 0.;
01524         i = 0;
01525         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
01526         
01527         for(double x = xmin; x < (xmax - 0.1 * it); x += it, i++) 
01528           {
01529             xv[0] = x;
01530             raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT3F1( xv );
01531             raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT3F2( xv );
01532           }
01533         i = raw - 1;
01534         xv[0] = xmax;
01535         raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT3F1( xv );
01536         raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT3F2( xv );
01537         
01538         sort2DBy1st(raw_pf);
01539         for(i = 0;  i < (raw_pf.dim(0) - 1); ) {
01540           if(raw_pf(i + 1,1) > raw_pf(i, 1)) raw_pf.remove_row(i + 1);
01541           else i++;
01542         }
01543 
01544         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
01545 }
01546 
01547 
01548 //************************************************************************
01549 // ZDT 4
01550 //************************************************************************
01551 
01552 // Scaled version
01553 double ZDT4F1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01554 {
01555   if(x[0] < -5.) {
01556     std::cerr << "ZDT4F1 called with invalid parameter x[0] = " <<  x[0] << std::endl;
01557     exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
01558   }
01559   return  (x[0] + 5.)/10.;// x[0];
01560 }
01561 
01562 double ZDT4G(const std::vector< double >& x )
01563 {
01564         double g;
01565         unsigned n = x.size( );
01566         g = 1 + 10 * (n - 1);
01567         for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; i++ ) 
01568           g += sqr(x[i]) - 10 * cos(4 * M_PI * x[i]);
01569         return g;
01570 }
01571 
01572 double ZDT4F2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01573 {
01574   return ZDT4G(x) * ( 1 - sqrt( ((x[0]+5.)/10.)/ ZDT4G(x) ) );
01575 }
01576 
01577 double ZDT4PrimeF2( const std::vector< double >& x , const Array<double> &coord)
01578 {
01579   unsigned i, j, n = x.size();
01580   double sum;
01581   std::vector< double > y;
01582   y.push_back(x[0]);
01583   for(i = 0; i < n-1; i++) {
01584     sum = 0.;
01585     for(j = 1; j < n; j++) sum += coord(i,j - 1) * x[j];
01586     y.push_back(sum);
01587   }
01588   return ZDT4G(y) * ( 1 - sqrt( ((y[0]+5.)/10.)/ ZDT4G(y) ) );
01589 }
01590 
01591 // Scaled version 2
01592 double ZDT4FII1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01593 {
01594   return  (x[0] + 5.)/10.;// x[0];
01595 }
01596 
01597 double ZDT4GII(const std::vector< double >& x )
01598 {
01599         double g;
01600         unsigned n = x.size( );
01601         g = 1 + 10 * (n - 1);
01602         for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; i++ ) 
01603           g += sqr(x[i]) - 10 * cos(4 * M_PI * x[i]);
01604         return g;
01605 }
01606 
01607 double ZDT4FII2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01608 {
01609   return ZDT4G(x) * ( 1 - sqrt( ((x[0]+5.)/10.)/ ZDT4G(x) ) );
01610 }
01611 
01612 // Unscaled version
01613 double ZDT4FG(const std::vector< double >& x )
01614 {
01615         double g;
01616         unsigned n = x.size( );
01617         g = 1 + 10 * (n - 1);
01618         for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; i++ ) 
01619           g += sqr(x[i]) - 10 * cos(4 * M_PI * x[i]);
01620         return g;
01621 }
01622 
01623 double ZDT4FF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01624 {
01625         return  ZDT4FG(x) * (1 - sqrt( x[0] /  ZDT4FG(x) ));
01626 }
01627 
01628 double ZDT4FF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01629 {
01630         return  x[0];
01631 }

01634 void ZDT4SampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned n = 500) 
01635 {
01636         double xmin = 0.;
01637         double xmax = 1.;
01638 
01639         pf.resize(n, 2u);
01640         unsigned raw = 10 * n;
01641         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
01642 
01643         std::vector< double > xv(10);
01644 
01645         unsigned i = 0;
01646         for(i = 1; i < 10; i++) xv[i] = 0.;
01647         i = 0;
01648         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
01649 
01650         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
01651         {
01652                 xv[0] = x;
01653                 raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT4FF1( xv );
01654                 raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT4FF2( xv );
01655         }
01656         i = raw - 1;
01657         xv[0] = xmax;
01658         raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT4FF1( xv );
01659         raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT4FF2( xv );
01660 
01661         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
01662 }

01664 //************************************************************************
01665 // ZDT 6
01666 //************************************************************************
01667 
01668 double ZDT6F1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01669 {
01670         return 1-exp(-4*x[0]) * pow( sin(6 * M_PI * x[0]), 6 );
01671 }
01672 
01673 double ZDT6G(const std::vector< double >& x )
01674 {
01675         double g;
01676         unsigned n = x.size( );
01677         g = 0;
01678         for ( unsigned i = 1; i < n; i++ ) 
01679                 g += x[i];
01680         g /= (n - 1);
01681         g = pow(g, 0.25);
01682         g *= 9.;
01683         g += 1.;
01684         return g;
01685 }
01686 
01687 double ZDT6F2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01688 {
01689         return  ZDT6G(x) * (1 - (ZDT6F1(x) /  ZDT6G(x)) * (ZDT6F1(x) /  ZDT6G(x)) );
01690 }
01691 
01692 void ZDT6SampleFront(Array< double > &pf, unsigned n = 500) 
01693 {
01694         double xmin = 0.;
01695         double xmax = 1.;
01696 
01697         pf.resize(n, 2u);
01698         unsigned raw = 50 * n;
01699         Array<double> raw_pf(raw, 2u);
01700 
01701         std::vector< double > xv(10);
01702 
01703         unsigned i = 0;
01704         for(i = 1; i < 10; i++) xv[i] = 0.;
01705         i = 0;
01706         double it = (xmax - xmin) / (raw - 1.);
01707 
01708         for(double x = xmin; x < xmax - 0.1 * it; x += it, i++) 
01709         {
01710                 xv[0] = x;
01711                 raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT6F1( xv );
01712                 raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT6F2( xv );
01713         }
01714         i = raw - 1;
01715         xv[0] = xmax;
01716         raw_pf(i, 0) = ZDT6F1( xv );
01717         raw_pf(i, 1) = ZDT6F2( xv );
01718 
01719         approxEquidistantFront(raw_pf, pf, n);
01720 }

01728 //
01729 //************************************************************************
01730 // SOO test function implementation of Tatsuya Okabe
01731 //************************************************************************
01732 //
01733 
01734 //************************************************************************
01735 // Sphere Test Function
01736 //************************************************************************
01737 double sphere( const std::vector< double >& x )
01738 {
01739         double a;
01740         unsigned i, n;
01741         for ( i = 0, a = 0, n = x.size( ); i < n; i++ )
01742         {
01743                 a += x[ i ]*x[ i ];
01744         }
01745         return a;
01746 }
01747 
01748 //************************************************************************
01749 // DeJong F2 Test Function
01750 //************************************************************************
01751 double DeJongF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01752 {
01753         double f;
01754         unsigned i, n;
01755         f = 0.0;
01756         n = x.size( );
01757         for ( i = 0; i < n-1; i++ )
01758         {
01759                 f += 100.0 * pow( x[i]*x[i]-x[i+1], 2.0 ) + pow( 1.0-x[0], 2.0 );
01760         }
01761         return f; 
01762 }
01763 
01764 //************************************************************************
01765 // DeJong F3 Test Function
01766 //************************************************************************
01767 double DeJongF3( const std::vector< double >& x )
01768 {
01769         double f;
01770         unsigned i, n;
01771         f = 0.0;
01772         n = x.size( );
01773         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01774         {
01775                 f += (double)( floor( x[ i ] ) );
01776         }
01777         return f; 
01778 }
01779 
01780 //************************************************************************
01781 // Schaffer F7 Test Function
01782 //************************************************************************
01783 double SchafferF7( const std::vector< double >& x )
01784 {
01785         double f,t;
01786         unsigned i, n;
01787         f = 0.0;
01788         n = x.size( );
01789         for ( i = 0; i < n-1; i++ )
01790         {
01791                 t = x[i]*x[i] + x[i+1]*x[i+1];
01792                 f += pow(t,0.25) * ( pow( sin( 50*pow(t,0.1) ), 2.0 ) + 1.0 );
01793         }
01794         return f;
01795 }
01796 
01797 //************************************************************************
01798 // Schwefel F1 Test Function
01799 //************************************************************************
01800 double SchwefelF1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01801 {
01802         double f;
01803         unsigned i, n;
01804         f = 0.0;
01805         n = x.size( );
01806         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01807         {
01808                 f += -x[i] * sin( pow( fabs(x[i]), 0.5 ) );
01809         }
01810         return f; 
01811 }
01812 
01813 //************************************************************************
01814 // Schwefel F2 Test Function
01815 //************************************************************************
01816 double SchwefelF2( const std::vector< double >& x )
01817 {
01818         double f;
01819         unsigned i, j, n;
01820         f = 0.0;
01821         n = x.size( );
01822         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01823         {
01824                 for ( j = 0; j < i+1; j++ )
01825                 {
01826                         f += x[j] * x[j];
01827                 }
01828         }
01829         return f; 
01830 }
01831 
01832 //************************************************************************
01833 // Rastrigin Test Function
01834 //************************************************************************
01835 double rastrigin( const std::vector< double >& x )
01836 {
01837         unsigned i, n;
01838         double sum;
01839         const double C = znPi2C;
01840         double A = 10.; // suitable for dim = 10
01841         double B = 10.; // suitable for dim = 10
01842         for ( i = 0, n = x.size( ), sum = n*A; i < n; i++ )
01843         {
01844                 sum += ( x[ i ] * x[ i ] ) - B * cos( C * x[ i ] );
01845         }
01846         return sum;
01847 }
01848 
01849 //************************************************************************
01850 // Rosenbrock Test Function
01851 //************************************************************************
01852 double rosenbrock( const std::vector< double >& x )
01853 {
01854         const double A = 100.;
01855         const double B = 1.;
01856         unsigned i, n;
01857         double   a;
01858         for( i = 0, a = 0, n = x.size( ); i < n; i++ )
01859         {
01860                 a += A*( ( ( ( x[ i ]) - x[ i+1 ]) * ( (x[ i ]) - x[ i+1 ]) ) + ( (x[ i ] - B) * (x[ i ] - B) ) ) * ( ( ( ( x[ i ]) - x[ i+1 ]) * ( (x[ i ]) - x[ i+1 ]) ) + ( (x[ i ] - B) * (x[ i ] - B) ) );
01861         }  
01862         return a;
01863 }
01864 
01865 //************************************************************************
01866 // Ackley Test Function
01867 //************************************************************************
01868 double ackley( const std::vector< double >& x )
01869 {
01870         const double A        = 20.;
01871         const double B        = 0.2;
01872         const double C        = znPi2C;
01873         unsigned i, n;
01874         double   a, b;
01875         for ( a = b = 0., i = 0, n = x.size( ); i < n; ++i )
01876         {
01877                 a += x[ i ] * x[ i ];
01878                 b += cos( C * x[ i ] );
01879         }
01880         return -A * exp( -B * sqrt( a / n ) ) - exp( b / n ) + A + znEC;
01881 }
01882 
01883 //************************************************************************
01884 // Func1 Test Function ( no name )
01885 //************************************************************************
01886 double func1( const std::vector< double >& x )
01887 {
01888         const double A = 5.;
01889         const double B = 31.4159265359;
01890         unsigned i, n;
01891         double   a;
01892         for ( i = 0, a  = 0, n = x.size( ); i < n; i++ )
01893         {
01894                 if ( (x[ i ]>=-5) && (x[ i ]<=5) )
01895                 {
01896                         a += (A - fabs(x [ i ])) * fabs( cos( B * x [ i ]) );
01897                 }
01898         }
01899         return a;
01900 }
01901 
01902 
01903 
01904 
01905 //
01906 //************************************************************************
01907 // IHR
01908 //************************************************************************
01909 //
01910 
01912 // IHR1 //
01914 inline double h(double x, double n) {
01915   return 1/(1+exp(-x/sqrt(n)));
01916 }
01917 
01918 inline double hf(double x, double y0, double ymax) {
01919   if(fabs(y0) <=  ymax) return x;
01920   return fabs(y0) + 1;
01921 }
01922 
01923 inline double hg(double x) {
01924   return sqr(x) / (fabs(x) + 0.1);
01925 }
01926 
01927 double IHR1F1(const std::vector<double> &x, const Array<double> &coord)
01928 {
01929   return fabs(scalarprod(coord.row(0), x));
01930 }
01931 
01932 double IHR1F2(const std::vector<double> &x, const Array<double> &coord)
01933 {
01934   unsigned i; 
01935   double g = 0;
01936   unsigned n = x.size();
01937   Array<double> y(n);
01938   
01939   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) y(i) = scalarprod(coord.row(i), x);
01940   
01941   double ymax = fabs(coord.col(0)(0));
01942   for(i = 1; i < n; i++) if(fabs(coord.row(0)(i)) > ymax) ymax = fabs(coord.row(0)(i));
01943   ymax = 1/ymax;
01944   
01945   for (i = 1; i < n; i++ ) g += hg(y(i));
01946   g = 9 * g / (n - 1.) + 1.;
01947 
01948   if(fabs(y(0)) <= ymax) return g * (1. - sqrt(h(y(0), n) / g));
01949   return g * (1 + fabs(y(0)));
01950 }
01951 
01953 // IHR2 //
01955 double IHR2F1(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
01956 {
01957         return fabs(scalarprod(coord.col(0), x));
01958 }
01959 
01960 double IHR2F2(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
01961 {
01962   unsigned i;
01963   double g = 0;
01964   unsigned n = x.size();
01965   Array<double> y;
01966   y.resize(n);
01967   
01968   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) y(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i), x);  
01969   double ymax = fabs(coord.col(0)(0));
01970   for(i = 1; i < n; i++) if(fabs(coord.row(0)(i)) > ymax) ymax = fabs(coord.row(0)(i));
01971   ymax = 1/ymax;
01972   
01973   
01974   for (i = 1; i < n; i++ ) g += hg(y(i));
01975   g = 9 * g / (n - 1.) + 1.;
01976   
01977   if(fabs(y(0)) <= ymax) return g * (1. - sqr(y(0) / g));
01978   return g * (1 + fabs(y(0)));
01979 }
01980 
01982 // IHR3 //
01984 double IHR3F1(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
01985 {
01986         return fabs(scalarprod(coord.col(0), x));
01987 }
01988 
01989 double IHR3F2(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
01990 {
01991   unsigned i;
01992   double g = 0;
01993   unsigned n = x.size();
01994   Array<double> y;
01995   y.resize(n);
01996   
01997   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) y(i) = scalarprod(coord.col(i), x);  
01998   double ymax = fabs(coord.col(0)(0));
01999   for(i = 1; i < n; i++) if(fabs(coord.row(0)(i)) > ymax) ymax = fabs(coord.row(0)(i));
02000   ymax = 1/ymax;
02001   
02002   
02003   for (i = 1; i < n; i++ ) g += hg(y(i));
02004   g = 9 * g / (n - 1.) + 1.;
02005   
02006   if(fabs(y(0)) <= ymax) return g * (1. - sqrt(h(y(0), n) / g) - h(y(0), n) / g * sin(10 * M_PI * y(0)));
02007   return g * (1 + fabs(y(0)));
02008 }

02012 // IHR4 //
02014 double IHR4F1(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
02015 {
02016   return fabs(scalarprod(coord.col(0), x));
02017 }
02018 
02019 double IHR4F2(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
02020 {
02021   unsigned i; 
02022   double g = 0;
02023   unsigned n = x.size();
02024   Array<double> y;
02025   y.resize(n);
02026   
02027   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) y(i) = scalarprod(coord.row(i), x);
02028   
02029   double ymax = fabs(coord.col(0)(0));
02030   for(i = 1; i < n; i++) if(fabs(coord.row(0)(i)) > ymax) ymax = fabs(coord.row(0)(i));
02031   ymax = 1/ymax;
02032   
02033   for (i = 1; i < n; i++ ) g += sqr(y(i)) - 10 * cos(4*M_PI*y(i));
02034   g += 10 * (n - 1.) + 1.;
02035 
02036   if(fabs(y(0)) <= ymax) return g * (1. - sqrt(h(y(0), n) / g));
02037   return g * (1 + fabs(y(0)));
02038 }

02042 // IHR6 //
02044 double IHR6F1(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
02045 {
02046   double y0 = scalarprod(coord.col(0), x);
02047   return 1-exp(-4*fabs(y0)) * pow( sin(6 * M_PI * y0), 6 );
02048 }
02049 
02050 double IHR6F2(const std::vector<double> &x, Array<double> &coord)
02051 {
02052   unsigned i; 
02053   double g = 0;
02054   unsigned n = x.size();
02055   Array<double> y;
02056   y.resize(n);
02057   
02058   for(i = 0; i < n; i++) y(i) = scalarprod(coord.row(i), x);
02059   double ymax = fabs(coord.col(0)(0));
02060   for(i = 1; i < n; i++) if(fabs(coord.row(0)(i)) > ymax) ymax = fabs(coord.row(0)(i));
02061   ymax = 1/ymax;
02062     
02063   for (i = 1; i < n; i++ ) g += hg(y(i));
02064   g = 1 + 9 * pow(g / (n-1.), .25);
02065 
02066   if(fabs(y(0)) <= ymax) return g * (1. - sqr(IHR6F1(x, coord) / g));
02067   return g * (1 + fabs(y(0)));
02068 }
